column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD BETWEEN NICHOLASVILLE RD AND HARRODSBURG RD:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions until further notice due to investigation of a serious collision that occurred overnight.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD BETWEEN NICHOLASVILLE RD AND HARRODSBURG RD:
column4: Inner loop traffic diverted to Nicholasville Rd.  Outer loop traffic diverted to Harrodsburg Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD BETWEEN NICHOLASVILLE RD AND HARRODSBURG RD:
